post:
LET,

Keeping this short and simple. UGVPS just provisioned new servers to every location, so we are launching our monthly sales round for July early :) Instant set up right after your order :)

- 2560MB (2.5GB) Guaranteed RAM
- 80GB Disk Space
- 2000GB Monthly Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- 4 CPU Cores
- OpenVZ

$45/year forever price. Equal to $3.75/m. Order: https://www.ugvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=106

This offer is good for new orders only.
